{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Whittling {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Whittling Whittling may refer either to the art of carving shapes out of raw wood using a knife or a time-occupying, non-artistic (contrast wood carving for artistic process) process of repeatedly shaving slivers from a piece of wood. It is used by many as a pastime, or as a way to make artistic creations. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Whittling)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
